subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Yankees fans Ron and Chad Gunderson, father and son, claim that seeing the same team win in 30 different stadiums will be a record. And it is no passive sit-and-keep-score venture.
snippet: Yankees fans Ron and Chad Gunderson, father and son, claim that seeing the same team win in 30 different stadiums will be a record. And it is no passive sit-and-keep-score venture.
